ModMetaData.name: Compressed Raid
ModMetaData.author: miyamiya, twsta, vokaerian
ModMetaData.description:
Compressed Raid 1.5
I will not be providing any bugfixes or support for this mod. If anyone wishes to continue development, please refer to the links below.
A quick and dirty 1.5 recomp of twista's fork of Compressed Raid, found here; URL: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2927368319
The recomp was made with twista's source files, available here; https://github.com/twstagg/Compressed-Raid
